snippet.title: Glory on the 4th of July - Barron Trump Sings
snippet.description:
Glory on the 4th of July – by “Barron Trump”

⬇️⬇️⬇️ Watch more videos below! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://youtu.be/WBHJZs8ZeFQ
https://youtu.be/GAdihLnAiXk
https://youtu.be/SZZW8YMZlMg?si=kP7ZE5s5fhhjjpX2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hq_JjAodbY0

Verse 1
Fireworks light the sky like prayers in the night
Red, white, and blue reflecting freedom’s fight
I stand on the shoulders of giants before
But I know it’s God who opens every door

Pre-Chorus
From the farms to the towers, from the plains to the bay
This land still whispers, “Kneel down and pray”

Chorus
Glory on the 4th of July, I raise my hands high
Not just for freedom, but the One in the sky
The flag waves bold, the eagle still flies
But my heart belongs to the Lord on high
America’s strong, but we need Him still
God bless this land — and may we do His will

Verse 2
I’ve seen the headlines, I’ve heard the cries
But grace still lives under these skies
This nation’s not perfect, but we’re still free
And that gift came down from Calvary

Pre-Chorus
So light up the sky, and sing loud and clear
Let God’s name echo from year to year

Chorus
Glory on the 4th of July, I raise my hands high
Not just for freedom, but the One in the sky
The flag waves bold, the eagle still flies
But my heart belongs to the Lord on high
America’s strong, but we need Him still
God bless this land — and may we do His will

Bridge
Let every spark remind us of His light
Let every song be a battle cry for right
From sea to shining sea, let the people say
“We trust in God — now and every day”

Final Chorus
Glory on the 4th of July, with fireworks above
I thank my Savior for His mercy and love
This land of the brave, this home of the free
Only stands ‘cause He died for me
So light the sky, and let freedom ring
But never forget — God is King

Outro
Happy birthday, America — may we always see
That without our God, we’ll never be free

All content, including references to real individuals, is created for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or deceased, is purely coincidental or used in a satirical, transformative, or fictional context. This content is not intended to defame, embellish, misrepresent, or harm the reputation of any individual. No endorsement or affiliation is implied unless explicitly stated.
